src:
La Liga. “Real” tarbiyalanuvchisi gol urgan o‘yinda “Barselona” 12-o‘rindagi jamoaga yutqazdi (video)

02 Nov 2019, 22:16

Futbol bo‘yicha Ispaniya chempionatining 12-turi doirasida 2-noyabr, shanba kuni 2 ta bellashuv yakunlandi.


Foto: Reuters

Ernesto Valverde boshqaruvidagi Kataloniyaning “Barselona” klubi “Levante” maydoniga safar qildi.
Uchrashuv davomida “ko‘k-anorranglilar” yetakchisi Lionel Messining 38-daqiqada penaltidan urgan goliga mezbonlar Xose Kampanya (61), Borxa Mayoral (63) va Nemanya Radoya (68)ning gollari bilan javob qaytardi.
Shu tariqa kataloniyaliklar mehmonda kechgan bahsda “Levante”ga 1:3 hisobida taslim bo‘ldi va ochko yo‘qotdi.
Qayd etish joiz, “Levante”ning ikkinchi goliga mualliflik qilgan Mayoral “Real” tarbiyalanuvchisi hisoblanadi.
Ma’lumot uchun, “Barselona” 22 ochko to‘plagan holda musobaqa jadvalida yetkachilik qilmoqda. “Levante” esa 17 ochko bilan 8-o‘ringa ko‘tarilib oldi.



La Liga12-tur bahslari2-noyabr, shanba“Espanyol”—“Valensiya” 1:2Gollar: 1:0 — 31, penalti Roka, 1:1 — 69, penalti Parexo, 1:2 — 80 Maksi Gomes“Levante”—“Barselona” 3:1Gollar: 0:1 — 38, penalti Messi, 1:1 — 61 Kampanya, 2:1 — 63 Mayoral, 3:1 — 68 Radoya

Yanada ko‘proq futbol va sport yangiliklaridan boxabar bo‘lishni istasangiz, “Daryo”ning Telegram’dagi rasmiy sport kanali — @daryo_sport’ga obuna bo‘ling!
text:
La Liga. Real Madrid teenager defeats Barcelona 12th in a goal (video)

02 Nov 2019, 22:16

On Saturday, November 2, two matches ended in the 12th round of the Spanish Football Championship.


Photo: Reuters

Catalonia Barcelona, led by Ernesto Valverde, visited Levante.
In the 38th minute, Lionel Messi scored a penalty kick with the hosts Jose Campania (61), Borja Mayoral (63) and Nemanya Radoya (68).
Thus, the Catalans lost 1: 3 to Levante in the away match and lost points.
Mayoral, who scored the second goal of Levante, is a Real Madrid pupil.
Barcelona are leading the table with 22 points. And Levante has risen to 8th with 17 points.



La Liga12 round 2 November Saturday Espanyol vs Valencia 1: 2 Goals: 1: 0 - 31, penalty Roca, 1-1 - 69, Parexo penalty, 1: 2 - 80 Maxi Gomes "Levante" - " Barcelona »3: 1 Goals: 0: 1 - 38, Messi penalty, 1: 1 - 61 Campania, 2: 1 - 63 Mayoral, 3: 1 - 68 Radoya
